SELECT f."FACILITY_ID" AS facilityId, f."FACILITY_NAME" AS facilityName, f."FACILITY_TYPE" AS facilityType, f."ADDRESS" AS address, ST_Y(ST_Transform(f."GEOM", 4326)) AS facilityGeomY, ST_X(ST_Transform(f."GEOM", 4326)) AS facilityGeomX, '위험' AS damageTypeKorean FROM FACILITY f
AND f."FACILITY_TYPE" = #{_parameter}
